subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Williams won her 19th Grand Slam singles title on Saturday, defeating Sharapova, 6-3, 7-6 (5) to become the oldest woman to win the singles title in the Open era.
snippet: Williams won her 19th Grand Slam singles title on Saturday, defeating Sharapova, 6-3, 7-6 (5) to become the oldest woman to win the singles title in the Open era.
